mapper.sql: front_id frontId,front_ip frontIp,front_port frontPort,create_time createTime,modify_time modifyTime
mapper.insert: insert ignore into tb_group (group_id,group_name,node_count,create_time,modify_time) values(#{groupId},#{groupName},#{nodeCount},NOW(),NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE node_count=#{nodeCount};
mapper.select:
select count(1) from tb_group where 1 = 1
and group_id = #{groupId}
select * from tb_group order by group_id asc

select a.group_id,b.maxDay,c.block_number,c.trans_count from tb_group a LEFT JOIN (select group_id,max(trans_day) as maxDay from tb_trans_daily GROUP BY group_id)b on (a.group_id = b.group_id) LEFT JOIN tb_trans_daily c on(b.group_id = c.group_id and b.maxDay = c.trans_day);

SELECT a.group_id groupId,a.node_count nodeCount,b.contractCount FROM tb_group a LEFT JOIN ( select group_id,count(1) contractCount from tb_contract where contract_type=0 GROUP BY group_id )b on(a.group_id = b.group_id) where a.group_id = #{groupId}
